title: How to get projects as a freelance content writer - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi, The best way out is by using LinkedIn. Some quick tips: Create engaging posts on LinkedIn, interact with like-minded people (who belong to your niche) through likes/shares/comments, etc. and make your profile strong.Create a personal hashtag for your posts that you can use in all your posts.Gradually, you will start building traction, and it will help you garner projects either through word-of-mouth or you can directly pitch to clients on LinkedIn. If you would like to check out my LinkedIn feed, visit my profile (link given in the Quora bio). Cheers,Manu Mathur[Content Marketer - Neil Patel Digital]
